description: Daimon Kaito is the protagonist of http://anidb.net/a8131 [Phi Brain: Kami no Puzzle]. Following his return from England, Kaito transferred to Root Academy as a first year in the high school division. After solving the Philosopher`s Puzzle he receives the title of Einstein. As one who loves to solve puzzles more than anything else, he is a natural-born Solver. The harder the puzzle he faces, the more concentration, intuition, and insight he is able to employ. He also possesses the sensitivity to perceive the puzzle creator`s intentions. He`s not fond of Negi and the sweets that Nonoha makes.
name: Daimon Kaito
